titles.title: To amend title 36, United States Code, to grant a Federal charter to the American Military Retirees Association, and for other purposes.
To amend title 36, United States Code, to grant a Federal charter to the American Military Retirees Association, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Grants a federal charter to the American Military Retirees Association.
